commit_scope: Unblock hosted self-improve stage execution by bootstrapping Codex API-key login in isolated HOME, broadening session-status detection to login/auth status variants, and adding a regression test that enforces API-key login bootstrap behavior.

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting workflow evidence that self-improve reaches completed status without codex auth-header failures.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Hosted Codex task runs in api_key mode now establish an authenticated Codex session in isolated HOME so stage execution can proceed beyond plan instead of failing with missing bearer auth header.
test_flows: Dispatch Self Improve Cycle and confirm report no longer fails with 401 missing bearer auth-header signature.
Confirm plan stage task output includes requested_mode=api_key with successful stage progression evidence.
Confirm workflow exits without creating a new self-improve failure issue for auth-header failure class.
